description:
This course is for people who are entirely new to Twitter, or who are struggling to understand it. It describes the absolute basics, such as how to navigate around Twitter on a laptop or desktop computer, or a when using the Twitter app on a smartphone or tablet.

The course is mainly demonstrations and explanations of how to use Twitter.

At just over an hour in total, this course is quick, easy introduction to the world of Twitter and tweeting.
title: Twitter absolute basics
